name: Mold Breaker
short-desc: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.
long-desc: This Pokemon's moves completely ignore abilities that could hinder or prevent their effect on the target.  For example, this Pokemon's moves ignore abilities that would fully negate them, such as ; abilities that would prevent any of their effects, such as , , or ; and abilities that grant any general protective benefit, such as , , or .  If an ability could either hinder or help this Pokemon's moves, e.g.  or , the ability is ignored either way.  Abilities that do not fit this description, even if they could hinder moves in some other way, are not affected.  For example,  only affects potential future uses of the move, while  and  can only hinder a move's effect on the user.  This ablity cannot ignore type or form changes granted by abilities, for example  or ; nor effects that were caused by abilities but are no longer tied to an ability, such as the rain from .  This ability cannot ignore  at all.  An ability ignored by this ability is only nullified while the move is being used.  For example, this Pokemon's moves can paralyze a Pokemon with , but Limber will activate and heal the paralysis immediately thereafter, and this Pokemon's  are not affected by this ability after they have been placed.  When this Pokemon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.  This ability functions identically to  and .
